hadiths.text: Abdullah bin Az-Zubair narrated from Aishah from the Prophet who said:“One sip or two sips do not make a prohibition.”

chapter.ara-name: باب مَا جَاءَ لاَ تُحَرِّمُ الْمَصَّةُ وَلاَ الْمَصَّتَانِ
chapter.eng-name: What has been related about: One sip or two sips will not make a prohibition
